positive_examples: This is an example of w m d component manufacturing facility.
The w m d component manufacturing facility demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed w m d component manufacturing facility in this context.
A typical case of w m d component manufacturing facility would involve these features.
The concept of w m d component manufacturing facility applies here.
A facility that produces specialized components and materials essential for WMD assembly and deployment.
negative_examples: This is an example of nuclear weapon production facility, not w m d component manufacturing facility.
This represents w m d weapons production facility in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: NuclearWeaponProductionFacility, or other types of WMDWeaponsProductionFacility

definition: A facility producing components for weapons of mass destruction.
